pageProduct.name: Viviscal Maximum Strength Supplement for Women 60
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Viviscal Hair Growth Supplement for Women is scientifically formulated with AminoMar C - Marine protein complex. Reduces hair loss and supports healthy hair growth for increased hair thickness in women.

Uses: Reduces hair loss and supports healthy hair growth for increased hair thickness in women.
At Viviscal, we understand hair. There are a whole range of factors which can impact the health of hair and existing hair growth. Viviscal supplements are scientifically formulated with the exclusive marine protein complex AminoMar C™ combined with the nutrients Biotin and Zinc which nourish the hair and support healthy hair growth from within in women with thinning hair.

Suitable For: Women

Boxed Contents: 60 Tablets, Film coated

Size: 60 Tablets

Warnings

Not to be taken by children, pregnant or breastfeeding women or those who have had a heart attack, surgery or major accident. Do not take in conjunction with other medication unless advised by a healthcare practitioner. In the event of an allergic reaction, cease use and see your doctor immediately. If symptoms persist, consult your healthcare practitioner. Keep out of reach of children. Vitamin supplements should not replace a balanced diet.

Each tablet is individually sealed. Do not use if seal is cut, torn or broken.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Only Viviscal supplements contain AminoMar C™

Each Tablet contains:
Shark Cartilage (From AminoMar C™) 375mg
Malpighia Glabra (Acerola) Fruit Powder 8.8mg
Equivalent to Ascorbic Acid 1.5mg
Equisetum Arvense (Horsetail) Stem Extact Dry Conc. 45mg
Equiv. Dry Stem 248mg
Panicum Miliacium (Millet) Seed Extract Dry Conc. 7.5mg
Equiv. Dry Seed 143mg
Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C) 57.4mg
Zinc (as Zinc Oxide) 11.2mg
Biotin 120 microgram
Nicotinamide (Vitamin B3) 12.1mg
Iron (as Ferrous Fumarate) 10.5mg

Contains: Crustacean products. Fish products.

Allergen Contains: Crustacean| Fish

Directions

Take 2 tablets daily for a minimum of 3-6 months (1 in the morning and 1 in the evening) taken with water after food. Viviscal tablets are easy to swallow. Do not exceed the recommended daily intake.

USAGE ADVICE

For best results use in conjunction with our Viviscal Gorgeous Growth Densifying Shampoo, Conditioner and Elixir.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store in a cool, dry place below 30°C and avoid excessive heat. tamper resistant.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
